/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban environment.
